00037                 template<typename target_type>
00038                 class nullary_incarnate_function
00039                 {
00040                 public:
00046                         nullary_incarnate_function(void (target_type::*function)())
00047                                 : function(function)
00048                         {
00049                         }
00050 
00052                         void operator()() const
00053                         {
00054                                 target_type target;
00055                                 (target.*function)();
00056                         }
00057 
00058                 private:
00060                         void (target_type::*function)();                        
00061                 };

00066                 template<typename target_type, typename param_type>
00067                 class unary_incarnate_function
00068                 {
00069                 public:
00077                         unary_incarnate_function(void (target_type::*function)(), param_type param)
00078                                 : function(function), param(param)
00079                         {
00080                         }
00081 
00083                         void operator()() const
00084                         {
00085                                 target_type target( param );
00086                                 (target.*function)();
00087                         }
00088 
00089                 private:
00091                         void (target_type::*function)();
00092 
00094                         param_type param;
00095                 };

00104                 template<typename target_type>
00105                 nullary_incarnate_function<target_type> incarnate(
00106                 void (target_type::*function)())
